sentences.en: Besides that, the observed areas of East Juyanhai by hydrological method were also collected.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还收集东居延海的水面面积旬观测数据及调水期间的日观测数据.

sentences.en: BFS ( Bayesian Forecasting System ) is one of theoretic frames to produce probabilistic hydrological forecasts.
sentences.cn: 贝叶斯概率预报系统 ) 就是构建概率水文预报的理论框架之一.

sentences.en: But It'should reinforce the point that, on hydrological grounds alone, conserving forest is often essential.
sentences.cn: 但是有一点需要强调的是仅水域而论, 保护森林是极其重要的.

sentences.en: Climate change is expected to alter hydrological regimes and the patterns of freshwater resources availability with impacts on both rainfed and irrigated agriculture.
sentences.cn: 预计气候变化将改变水文体系和淡水资源来源的模式，这将对旱作和灌溉农业都有影响。

sentences.en: Conclusion is the parametric models do some simplicity and supposition the hydrological phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 两个模型均通过模型适用性检验,模拟效果均达到实用的要求,是可行而有效的.

sentences.en: Finally , the causes of runoff variation in Sanchuanhe River Basin were analyzed with hydrological simulation method.
sentences.cn: 采用水文模拟途径分析了三川河流域径流量的变化原因.

sentences.en: Hydrological monitoring and flood early warning and forecasting system.
sentences.cn: 水文和洪水监测预警预报体系.

sentences.en: In this system, the mode of hydrological information transmission is very important.
sentences.cn: 水情信息的传输方式是该系统的重要部分.

sentences.en: Period superposition forecasting model is a practical method in mid - to - long - term hydrological forecasting.
sentences.cn: 摘要周期迭加预报是 中长期 水文预报的一种实用模型.

sentences.en: Proper hydrological function of wetland systems year and the changing seasons are critical to their survival.
sentences.cn: 湿地系统的水文功能随季节而变化,季节变化对湿地的生存非常重要.

sentences.en: The checking accepting standards of Hydrological Data Acquisition System ( HDAS ) construction vary with its work mode.
sentences.cn: 水文遥测系统工作制式不同,系统的验收标准也不同.

sentences.en: The condition of hydrological geology is relatively complexity and the contact of waterpower karst mine area.
sentences.cn: 它决定着矿床水文地质条件复杂程度和矿山防治水设计难度,是矿山排水和矿床疏干设计的重要依据.

sentences.en: The paper analyzes precipitation, evaporate, run off , water resources etc. hydrological characteristic in Heihe City.
sentences.cn: 分析了黑河市的降水 、 蒸发 、 径流 、 水资源等水文特征.

sentences.en: The series of low and high water levels are inevitable variations of normal hydrological sequences.
sentences.cn: 上游山区来水量多年平均无大的变化,某些时段的偏枯或偏半是正常水主序列的必然变化过程.

sentences.en: The theme addresses the role of forests and trees outside forests to help moderate soil, hydrological and aquatic systems.
sentences.cn: 本主题处理森林及森林外树木帮助调节土壤、水文以及水生系统的作用。

sentences.en: This paper introduced multivariate hydrological analysis and estimation methods and the existent problems.
sentences.cn: 综述了多变量水文分析计算方法及存在的问题.

sentences.en: Thus cloudiness decreases even as the hydrological cycle accelerates and precipitation and evaporation increase.
sentences.cn: 云量降低甚至出现在水循环加速和降水、蒸发增加以后.
